Reviews.Content: Phone is not unlocked I couldnt used it in my country, I tried with all the telephone companies and was not possible

Reviews.Title: Well Im not happy with them, because my cellphone come not unlocked and I bought unlocked. Anyway thanks

Reviews.Content: Good afternoon well I'm not happy with them, because my cellphone come not unlocked and I bought unlocked. Anyway thanks

Reviews.Title: phone stopped working after one month.
Reviews.Author: elysia eaton
Reviews.Content: phone screen went blue one day for no reason. Only had it less than a month, when it stopped working.Taking it to the genius bar to find out what went wrong.

Reviews.Title: Amazing!
Reviews.Author: Ashten
Reviews.Content: I ordered this phone on a Friday and it arrived the following Monday!Phone was in perfect condition looked like it was used a month, it was unlocked and works great on my network, it came with a wall charger car charger and a case! Very happy with my product, would definitely purchase from seller again.

Reviews.Title: bad bad
Reviews.Author: Alfonzo Hurtado
Reviews.Content: firs, you ship me a cell of another color, i paid for a iphone 4 white and i recieved in black, and i think what my cell phone is not unlocked from factory cause i tested my SIM and is not available for the cell phone.... bad service... sorry

Reviews.Title: Not as advertised
Reviews.Author: Tomie Nelson "cln"
Reviews.Content: This I-phone IV was advertised to be unlocked ready to go. After spending nearly a month with multiple retailers and dealing directly with AT&T; I was informed the phone could not be unlocked as whomever had it before had already exceeded the maximum number of "unlock attempts" for this device for a one year period which is 6.  I'm sure the phone would be great and is the music player and wifi worked beautifully, but it turned out to be a $200 paperweight for my daughters birthday.  The phone has been returned and fortunately the seller is going to also refund my cost of shipping for this inconvenience.  Other than that I can't rate the functionality of the phone and many of it's features.

Reviews.Title: The phone not work.
Reviews.Author: ernesto santos
Reviews.Content: The phone not turn on. coming broken, and open box , It is not the phone I specter to arrive.

Reviews.Title: It looks great, works fast
Reviews.Author: Amanda Isaac
Reviews.Content: I like the phone. Very very little damage cosmetically. It works fast and I haven't had a problem yet. Good phone.

Reviews.Title: Great quality as usual
Reviews.Author: Joel Selby
Reviews.Content: Apple products are always great and this one only had one exception to that which was that it will not charge to above 92%.  First time I've seen this from an Apple product but I don't know how many hours this one has on it as I bought it used.  Still happy for the price.

Reviews.Title: iPhone 4s
Reviews.Author: Maria Ureña Herrera
Reviews.Content: This cellphone is beutiful, umlocked and works perfctly, i love it so much, im so happy with the service, thanks

Reviews.Title: It got here on time but the phone its self....
Reviews.Author: Mac Dre
Reviews.Content: THE PHONE HAS MAD GLITCHES OR ITS DEFECTED.IT WAS IN GOOD CONDITION FOR A USED PHONE THO.ITS NOT PERFECT THO BUT IT WILL DO.

Reviews.Title: Its a apple!
Reviews.Author: stephen lynard steen
Reviews.Content: Its top of the line what else is there to say ..Just depends on what your trying to do. Wish I would of gotton more GB

Reviews.Title: GREAT!
Reviews.Author: Sharon
Reviews.Content: A VERY NICE PHONE IT WAS UNLOCKED WHEN I RECIVED IT FAST DELIVERY GREAT BUY RECOMEND IT TO EVERYONE WHO LIKES SMARTPHONES!

Reviews.Title: Awesome company
Reviews.Author: Tahoegirl
Reviews.Content: I would use this company again. The product was a great price an it came in an unopened brand new box. I would recommend this vendor anytime. My iphone was mailed from the East Coast to me in the West Coast and it arrived in about 3-4 days. I ordered a factory unlocked phone so I can choose almost any phone company I wish. Phone works great.

Reviews.Title: So far so good.
Reviews.Author: Méw12
Reviews.Content: I ordered a used white 8gb iPhone 4 ( unlocked ) and it arrived in great condition. It was well refurbished and I've yet to find any problems with the device. It was also unlocked so I didn't have any problems on that end. I popped in my tmobile micro sim and was ready to go. Fast, simple, perfect. :)Now let me talk about the shipping though. It was shipped quickly once the order was placed, but there were problems with the delivery. Boy was it frustrating. The package was shipped through USPS, and boy was that a nightmare for me. It was suppose to arrive yesterday, and it didn't. You know what I found in my mailbox instead.....a " sorry we missed you" slip! I was home all day, waiting for the package to arrive like a hawk. Never did I hear a knock, nor doorbell ring for the package. I can see it all now. The lazy bum probably didn't want to walk down the street to my door to have me sign for the package. I bet this happens a lot. They figure, "Hey, most of the time if I leave this slip, they'll just go get the package themselves at the post office, so I'll do just that."  >-<!!!!!!I decided to let it slide and just re schedule a delivery to let them know I don't plan on going to pick it up. So what, I do is, go online and re-schedule a delivery for today. I got my confirmation email yesterday that I'd get it today, and boom I was done....or so I thought. I waited for the mailman today and soon as he stopped by the mailboxes and left the mail, he left to the next mailboxes down the street. Seeing that he didn't come to my house, I was furious! >-<!!!I ran out the house and chased the guy where I confronted him about my package. He told me it wasn't him yesterday and it was a different mailman working that day. So I asked him where my package was, ( being that I had it re-scheduled to be delivered today ) and he tells me he doesn't have it.......................>.<......!!!!!Ay ya yayyy!Long story short ( even thought the story was long )I ended up going to the postal office today myself, and picked up it.USPS...why....just why....Anyway, sorry about my rant. Back to the phone, I appreciate the fast shipping, and "just as describe" iPhone.It actually came in better condition than I expected. That I liked. Like I said before, everything works and I couldn't be happier.I'll update my review in a couple of months to see whether or not this use/refurbished phone lasts.
